title: Application Error (0xc0000005)
body: I just recently gotten this error message every time I try and launch League. I don't have any antiviruses and i have tried to use both CCleaner and Hextech Repair Tool. I have restarted my laptop and uninstalled and reinstalled League many times to try and get it to work but nothing is working. Please help me.

replies.body: There may be some corrupted client files in your installation that are preventing the game from being able to open normally. Make sure you use that [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** checked to clean up those files and let me know how that helps.
I just tried the hextech repair tool again today and it worked, Thanks!
